mapper.insert: insert into HR_BBS values(HR_BBS_seq.nextval, #{b_category}, #{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{b_id}, #{b_name}, sysdate, null, 0, #{b_notice})
mapper.update: update HR_BBS set b_title=#{b_title}, b_content=#{b_content} where b_no = #{b_no}
update HR_REPLY set rp_content = #{rp_content} where rp_no = #{rp_no}
mapper.select: select b.*, m.m_photo from HR_BBS b, HR_MEMBER m where b_no = #{b_no} and b_id = m_id
select * from HR_BBS, HR_MEMBER where b_id = m_id and ${search} like '%'||#{query}||'%' order by b_date
select count(*) from HR_BBS, HR_MEMBER where b_id = m_id
